entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-03-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • `Console.ReadKey` throws `InvalidOperationException` on Ctrl+S #99938
  • Individual test building usability #99937
  • [API Proposal] Add APIs that needed for emitting symbols with reflection emit PersistedAssemblyBuilder #99935
    9.0.0
  • High memory consumption using X509Certificate2 GetNameInfo((X509NameType.UpnName, false) #99933
  • Issues with authorization on Blazor wasm #99930
  • Assertion failed '!"Extra flags on tree"' #99929
    9.0.0
  • Assert failure: !m_pMethodBeingCompiled->IsDynamicMethod() #99928
    9.0.0
  • [Wasm SDK] ComputeWasmPublishAssets incorrectly upgrades compressed asset versions of assets that are not included as part of publish. #99917
  • Remove `--fuse-ld=` from Native AOT link argument #99912
    9.0.0
  • Runtime tests for NativeAOT send unnecessary files in Helix payloads #99910
    Future
  • Consider using process snapshotting APIs for System.Diagnostics.Process #99906
  • Static getter Encoding.BigEndianUTF32 is private #99903
  • .Net 6.0 XDocument XML Giving Wrong Value of an Element (Bug) #99899
  • [Net] System Threading Portable Thread Pool + IOCCompletionPoller, WaitOneNocheck and LevelLifoSemaphore almost stop to run. #99896
  • Using SocketsHttpHandler and NSUrlSessionHandler in the same net8.0-ios project causes incorrect 401 runtime errors for NTLM authorized HTTP requests #99892
  • Using SocketsHttpHandler on macOS (net8.0-macos) with network credentials will crash the app #99891
  • [browser][MT] TIMED_OUT but 0 was expected #99888
    9.0.0
  • Process.Linux: handle when proc mount mismatches with pid namespace #99887
  • System.Runtime.InteropServices.Marshal.StringToHGlobalUTF8 is declared as private, but the rest of UTF-8 functions in Marshal are public #99886
  • Test failure: Interop/NativeLibrary/Callback/CallbackStressTest_TargetUnix/CallbackStressTest_TargetUnix.cmd #99885
  • Test failure: JIT/opt/InstructionCombining/ArrayLengthArithmetic/ArrayLengthArithmetic.dll #99884
    9.0.0
  • Allow modification of entry assembly and probing after startup hooks are run #99883
    9.0.0

Closed

  • System.Reflection.Emit.AssemblyBuilder.Save #15704
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Add mechanism for indicating a method/constructor/property violates constraints #99788
    9.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Parallel Foreach #99864
  • Native AOT: Is there any way to link to the hybrid c runtime? #99895
  • NAOT: fold "always false" typechecks #97601
    9.0.0
  • SuperPMI asmdiffs checked release setup (windows x64) - setup failure - `checked_directory doesn't exist` #99923
  • ReadOnlySequence.Slice InvalidCastException #30736
  • Multiple dispose called for chained dependency injection - Is it actual a bug? #97475
    9.0.0
  • [JIT] Remove BBF_NONE_QUIRK #95998
    9.0.0
  • Using TypeBuilder as a generic type parameter throws NotSupportedException in AssemblyBuilder created by DefinePersistedAssembly #99505
    9.0.0
  • [Android][arm] System.Numerics.Tensors.Net8.Tests time out on Andrid arm #96923
  • ExceptionOnStartIsPropagated test failed in CI #84562
    9.0.0
  • System.DirectoryServices.Protocols.Tests.BerConverterTests.Decode_Bytes_ReturnsExpected failing on Windows x86 #99725
  • Test failure: Interop/Swift/SwiftAbiStress/SwiftAbiStress/SwiftAbiStress.cmd #99882
    9.0.0
  • [mono] box related IL instruction sequence optimization for interpreter #99379
    9.0.0
  • Error "Hosting components are already initialized. Re-initialization to execute an app is not allowed." #99858
  • For `dotnet/llvm-project` only: Remove ObjWriter cpp code. #99782
  • Wasm.Build.Tests.WasmTemplateTests.RunWithDifferentAppBundleLocations times out #94821
    9.0.0
  • Time out in Directed_3.0.1 work item #99638

PullRequests

Created

  • [mono] Optimize mono_metadata_decode_row_col_raw #99939
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Initial spec for the meaning and relationships between data contracts #99936
    area-Meta
  • [NativeAOT/x86] Fix null check in RhpLockCmpXchg64 #99934
    arch-x86, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Double default initial heap size #99927
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • JIT: Remove hasLikelihood checks; make FlowEdge::m_likelihoodSet debug-only #99925
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] Improvements to startup performance of mono_wasm_get_assembly_exports #99924
    NO-MERGE, arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • [ILLink] Mark recursive interface implementations in MarkStep #99922
    NO-MERGE, linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Attribute for ByRefLike generics #99916
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices, 9.0.0
  • Fix failing CertificateValidationRemoteServer.ConnectWithRevocation_WithCallback test #99915
    area-System.Net.Security
  • [mono] Add generic parameter checks for fields of generic types #99911
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • Fix NegotiateStream connections between Linux clients and Windows servers #99909
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • [mono][HybridGlobalization] Fix ShortDatePattern year format to be "yyyy" #99908
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios, 9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] make blazor's sendByteArray also fire and forget #99904
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Fix x86 hardware intrinsics #99894
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Remove scheme check for Proxy on ServicePointManager #99893
    area-System.Net, 9.0.0
  • Fix Http2 deadlock #99889
    area-System.Net.Http, 9.0.0

Merged

  • Fix workloads build by bringing back some needed variables #99932
    area-Build-mono
  • Convert the Remaining Legacy Tests to the Merged Wrapper Model #98469
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Fix failing BerConverterTests.Decode_TestData test #99793
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • Use release config for Mono tests #99920
    area-Infrastructure
  • ILVerify after kept member validation #99914
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • NativeAOT/x86: Implement ResolveVirtualFunction R2R helper #99913
    arch-x86, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fold always false type checks #99761
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Update publishing to include *.pkg files #99931
    needs-area-label
  • Fix template parameter name in SuperPMI jobs #99918
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: fix synthetic profile check option, track improper headers #99795
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0] disable optimizations for PopCount #99926
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 8.0.4
  • JIT: Remove BBF_NONE_QUIRK #99907
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix indentation in runtimelab pipeline #99921
    area-Infrastructure
  • Fix: Using TypeBuilder as generic argument for a parent type throws #99771
    area-System.Reflection.Emit
  • Fix ComponentGovernance running on public PR/CI jobs #99898
    area-Infrastructure
  • JIT: Fix an invalid use of remainder liveness in physical promotion #99897
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT/x86] Load RtlRestoreContext dynamically and add fallback for old OSes #99813
    arch-x86, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Fix CoreCLR stress pipelines that run libraries tests only #99868
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • [mono][debugger] Fix inspect Span<byte> #99843
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [mono] Split the negative ref struct substitution testcases to enable the one working with Mono #99826
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • JIT: Remove fallthrough quirk in fgFindInsertPoint #99783
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Disable time tracking in wasm release builds because it's expensive #99841
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [wasm][debugger] CI was broken for wasm debugger tests #99824
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Fix prepare-artifacts.proj #99890
    area-Infrastructure-installer
  • [mono][interp] Various optimizations for box patterns used in byreflike struct generics #99684
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono

Updated

  • Scalar/Packed conversions for floating point to integer #97529
    breaking-change, area-CodeGen-coreclr, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
  • [mono] Add unchecked version of stelem_ref interpreter opcode #99829
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Remove remaining CRT PAL wrappers and enable including standard headers in the CoreCLR build #98336
    area-PAL-coreclr
  • basic support for TCP fast open #99490
    area-System.Net.Sockets, new-api-needs-documentation, 9.0.0
  • some code clean up in heap_select #99855
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Use MemoryMarshal.Cast in a few places #99835
    area-Meta
  • Make normal statics simpler (DRAFT) #99183
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-coreclr
  • [NO REVIEW] correctness test for a perf improvement #98838
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Unify formatting part of BigInteger of CoreLib #97889
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Analyze recursive interfaces in illink #99566
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • JIT: Use likelihood-based edge weights #99736
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Revise compiler hardening options on Unix #98622
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • [NativeAOT] Port x86 ResumeSP logic from CoreCLR #99866
    arch-x86, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Use non locking atomic intrinsics #97527
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Enable NativeAOT win-x86 runtime tests #99688
    arch-x86, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Adding `Avx10v1` to the runtime #99784
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx10
  • Implement `ShuffleUnsafe` methods #99596
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Implements more advanced ILLink/ILCompiler analysis for Type.GetMember #94879
    linkable-framework, community-contribution, needs-author-action, area-Tools-ILLink
  • [mono] Update runtime docs. #99699
    documentation, area-Build-mono
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0' => 'release/8.0-staging' #99585
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, linkable-framework
  • Getting vxsort working on Linux amd64 #98712
    area-GC-coreclr
  • JIT: Remove bbFallsThrough check in optFindLoopCompactionInsertionPoint #99827
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Optimize BigInteger.Divide #96895
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Optimize BigInteger.Parse #97589
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Simplify BigInteger.Multiply #98587
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Fix some generic math DIMs to have the correct behavior #98510
    area-System.Numerics
  • JIT ARM64-SVE: Allow LCL_VARs to store as mask #99608
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • Vector64: Avoid GSCookies in Vector64 software fallback #98293
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, community-contribution
  • Start moving over to official templates #99433
    area-Infrastructure
  • Predicate registers #98258
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser][MT] use regular POSIX portable threadpool #99836
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging][mono][debugger] Fix inspect Span<byte> #99844
    Servicing-consider, area-Debugger-mono, 8.0.x
  • [release/6.0-staging] Fix exporting certificate keys on macOS 14.4. #99781
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Security
  • [release/7.0-staging] Fix exporting certificate keys on macOS 14.4. #99779
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Security
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix exporting certificate keys on macOS 14.4. #99776
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Security
  • Reduce Linq usage in FileSystemGlobbing #98109
    area-Extensions-FileSystem
  • Path.GetFullPath(string, string) uses case insensitive volume name comparison for drive rooted, relative paths #97759
    area-System.IO, community-contribution
  • Allow setting ZipArchiveEntry general-purpose flag bits #98278
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • Set version in ZIP local header to ZIP64, when the file offset is >4GB #94970
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution
  • Use \e instead of \u001B or \x1B #99659
    area-Meta
  • Make mutable generic collection interfaces implement read-only collection interfaces #95830
    area-System.Collections, community-contribution
  • [browser] Run tests in parallel #98492
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Optimize flips between 1 and 0 #95990
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Update Alpine versions for `release/8.0-staging` #99849
    area-Infrastructure
  • Dynamic event support #99862
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [browser][MT] Handling blocking wait #99833
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Don't unset ALPN list pointer during ALPN selection callback. #99670
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net.Security
  • Use templated encoding helpers for signed and unsigned immediates #99815
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-arm64-sve
  • [mono] Stop exporting ICU symbols from Mono #99449
    area-System.Globalization, runtime-mono, os-ios, 8.0.x
  • Implement MsQuicConfiguration cache #99371
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • Implement swift lowering algorithm in Mono's type system #99439
    area-Interop-mono
  • fix ping with TTL on Linux #99875
    area-System.Net, 9.0.0
  • Add additional checks to optimization of constant static field loads #99845
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Simplified muxer fix #99576
    area-Host
